Nightlight:

"If I remember rightly you said something about her Predacon program, 
that It does that she acts in that way..." said Nighlight "if we try 
to convince her to be reprogramed as Maximal, that could help her, 
couldn't she? Altough"she stopped and doubted a sec "I don't sure 
that if that works, I think that exist other reason..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Once again, oops.  I misread.
> 
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He looks at his feet and scuffs one in the dirt.  "I agree.  I 
don't want 
> to have to train Trinity, but she is always running out into 
battle.  Then 
> people have to put themselves at risk to save her.  With a little 
training 
> maybe she wouldn't run out into battle.  At least that's what I 
hope..."  He 
> looks up into the sky, watching the clouds overhead.  "I know that 
training 
> is risky.  That's why I'm going to supervise it.  I can't let her 
get hurt."
